options.name: Aerialist
options.description: Gain +1 Coordination and +1 Evade. You can use jetpacks and personal flight devices with expertise.

options.name: Aerial Maneuvers
options.description: Gain +1 Coordination. You can perform complex aerial maneuvers while using flight devices without making an ability check.

options.name: Improved Propulsion
options.description: Your flight speed with jetpacks and similar devices increases by 50%. Gain +1 Engineering.

options.name: Aerial Combat Training
options.description: Gain +1 Evade and +1 Attack while flying. You don't suffer disadvantage on attack rolls while using flight devices.

options.name: Action : Aerial Strike
options.description: Dive attack from above. Move up to your flight speed and make an attack with advantage that deals an additional 1d6 damage.

options.name: Reaction : Evasive Jets
options.description: When targeted by an attack while flying, you can use your reaction to move up to half your flight speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

options.name: Flight Expert
options.description: Gain +1 Coordination and +1 Evade. Your fuel consumption for flight devices is reduced by 50%, effectively doubling their operational time.

options.name: Action : Aerial Bombardment
options.description: While flying, you can drop explosives or other objects on targets below with deadly accuracy, affecting a 10-foot radius area with a successful attack.

options.name: Free Action : Quick Boost
options.description: You can use a quick burst from your jetpack to gain 10 feet of height or horizontal movement as a free action once per turn.

options.name: Master Aerialist
options.description: Gain +1 Coordination and +1 Evade. You can hover indefinitely with flight devices that normally cannot hover. You gain a permanent flight speed of 10 feet even without devices due to your mastery of micro-jets and anti-grav tech.
